mapper.select: SELECT A.RESULT_START_TIME AS SLEEP_START_TIME , A.RESULT_END_TIME AS SLEEP_END_TIME , A.SLEEP_TYPE FROM RESULT_SLEEP A WHERE A.ADMISSION_ID = #{admissionId} AND A.RESULT_START_DATE BETWEEN DATE (#{resultStartDate}) AND DATE (#{resultEndDate}) AND A.RESULT_START_TIME BETWEEN TIME (#{resultStartTime}) AND TIME (#{resultEndTime});
